headline: Political forecaster shares thoughts on Pa. Senate and Gov. races
author: Dennis Owens
sentences: Donald Trump continues to stump across the country but Pennsylvania-based syndicated columnist and author Salena Zito insists 2022 will not be about the Donald but the frustrated and overlooked voters who embraced him and are still out there.
